channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: His Thirteenth Wife
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Herbert Raymond Carter)
item.description: His plan was simple: find a homely, rich young woman, woo and marry her. Then murder her and steal her fortune. But would wife number 13 be lucky or unlucky for Jonas Bruckner?
